abstract: With apologies to "Like a Rolling Stone" and other classic runners-up, here are three great No. 2's.
snippet: With apologies to "Like a Rolling Stone" and other classic runners-up, here are three great No. 2's.
lead_paragraph: With apologies to some classic runners-up, like "Like a Rolling Stone," "Dancing in the Street" and "Proud Mary," here are three of the best:

headline.main: My Three Favorite Songs That Peaked at No. 2
